title: Perm skin bug?
body: I finally got enough keys to open a chest. When I opened the chest I got orange essence and what said Project: Yi when i highlighted over the button it had said unlock permanent so I clicked it. I went to the collection tab to see what the skin looks like, but it's saying that it is still locked. Not sure if this is a bug or what exactly I got from the chest then.

replies.body: Ahaaa it looks like you actually received the Project: Yi Summoner Icon as opposed to the skin itself. Check your list of available icons and you should find it waiting for you there!
